medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute mid-epigastric and RUQ pain radiating to back.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 16 hours prior to presentation, waking the patient from sleep. Pain intensity was described as distinct from previous pain experienced during hospitalizations. Notably, pain was preceded by soreness at the site of a drain that was tugged a day before, which resulted in a temporary increase in greenish purulent fluid output from the drain.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Obesity, Asthma, Gastroesophageal reflux disease, Osteoarthritis.
